EmailTemplate.name: 2011_APCO_Hospitality_EntertoWin
EmailTemplate.subject: APCO - Hospitality Suite / Enter to Win iPAD Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
APC0 2011 - Hospitality Suite Monday, August 8 l Philadelphia Marriott
APCO attendees and special guests are cordially invited to the TriTech Hospitality Suite. Enjoy hosted beverages, hors d'ouevres and door prizes. For details and to pick up your exclusive invitation, visit TriTech Booth #1025 or contact Phil.
Date: Monday, August 8
Time: 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m.
Location: Philadelphia Marriott
LOOKING FORWARD TO A GREAT CONFERENCE:
Phil Sisk phil.sisk@tritech.com Phone: (774) 242-5505
ENTER TO WIN
Tell us what you think the future of public safety will look like and you will be entered to win an iPad 2.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
